answers.answer: Congratulations. Hope all goes well and he comes home soon ☺
Glad to hear you both are doing well! Hopefully he'll be home in no time :)
Congratulations! Best wishes ...hope you get to take your baby home soon...
Awww that's a blessing everything is OK congrats
what a blessing wishing y'all the best
Congrats God Bless u and ur family☺☺
Congrats momma wishing you the best and fast recovery for your little one :)
Congrats!  My Lil girl was born at 32 weeks,  3lbs 5oz. She stayed in the nicu a month.  I'm thankful for the nicu nurses everyday.  Goodluck (:

Congratulations! My first was very similar born 9 weeks early due to preeclampsia. It sounds like you have a great outlook and that will get you through. 30ish weekers rock and are super strong. Take care and enjoy your little one.

Congrats I know how hard it can be to have a preemie and not be able to take him home.. The nicu is a great place with wonderful people I had my daughter at 30 weeks and sone days  And she was 2 lbs 14 oz. She did really good too..

question: My baby was born 12/11/24 @ 9:24pm. I was induced because I had very high levels of protein in my urine and my blood pressure was over 200/150 for a consecutive of atleast 3 days. Went to the ER because my pressure was slightly elevated to find it had risen even more by the time I made it to the hospital. So, I was admitted and watched very closely until my doctor said I could go no longer with my pregnancy. It was a very scary week, but he's here and doing really great!!! The NICU is an amazing place and full of amazing people!!! He was born @ 30 weeks 5 days weighing 3 lbs 8 ozs....Hopefully he'll be home soon because he's making great progress!!!
title: Ayden's Here!!!!! 9 weeks early
